lists.name: IDN Homograph & Favicon Security List - ABP version (MV2)
lists.description: Security-focused filter list mitigating IDN/Punycode homograph phishing and favicon-based spoofing vectors without breaking site functionality.
lists.update_policy: Stable; updated only when new, well-established attack vectors emerge
